comment: jeff is the chillest dude of all time. if you show up and put in the legwork, he will see that you care and do his best to help you. could not recommend him more.

Awesome professor, the work is a good amount, if you do everything in class you shouldn't have to come to the open studio as much, but he's very knowledgeable about ceramics and willing to help students out outside of class. Knows a lot of people in the ceramic community. Apparently invented a bunch of ceramics techniques.

Very understanding and supportive. Encourages students no matter what the skill level. Critiques based on effort and care for your skill level. Very chill and flexible. He understands how stressful a class of this nature is and constantly works with students so they can produce their best work. Amazing professor.

Best professor I have had in a long while!! Took him for ceramics 1 and he is just literally the best. He's so nice and really cares about his students. Really makes his studio feel like home. 10/10 would take again for literally any class haha

He's an amazing professor! He is kind, knowledgeable, and experienced. He gives out challenging but fun assignments. He really gets you to think critically. Although 3D and sculpture are not my major, I would like to take another class with him. This is probably the first time I had a fun time with a group project. Definitely recommend.

A very talented and intelligent professor who is always ready to help, is very clear and concise in expectations, and expects you to show up and put forth the effort to be successful. Class time is very comfortable and enjoyable, even during crunch times.

Jeff is by far one of the most amazing teachers i've ever had. he's extremely understanding and very knowledgeable, and will probably help you if you ask. Makes throwing on the wheel look like the easiest thing known to man. he's awesome.
